languages.text: "Можно ли требовать от любовников, чтобы они судили друг о друге непредвзято? К тому же..." {n}Соломон придает голосу мягкости.{/n} "...я не вижу себя человеком, заинтересованным в глубоких отношениях с кем-то".

"Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."
languages.original_text: "Можно ли требовать от любовников, чтобы они судили друг о друге непредвзято? К тому же..." {n}Соломон придает голосу мягкости.{/n} "...я не вижу себя человеком, заинтересованным в глубоких отношениях с кем-то".

traits.locale_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

"Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

"Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

"Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

"Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

languages.text: "Können Liebende erwarten, unbefangen übereinander zu urteilen? Außerdem ..." {n}Solomornes Stimme wird sanft.{/n} "Ich denke, ich bin niemand, der für eine intime Beziehung mit einer anderen Person offen ist."
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

traits.locale_text: "Können Liebende erwarten, unbefangen übereinander zu urteilen? Außerdem ..." {n}Solomornes Stimme wird sanft.{/n} "Ich denke, ich bin niemand, der für eine intime Beziehung mit einer anderen Person offen ist."

languages.text: « Est-il possible pour des amants de se juger sans parti pris ? De plus... je ne me considère pas comme quelqu'un qui peut avoir une relation aussi intime avec une autre personne, » {n}termine-t-il d'une voix plus douce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

traits.locale_text: « Est-il possible pour des amants de se juger sans parti pris ? De plus... je ne me considère pas comme quelqu'un qui peut avoir une relation aussi intime avec une autre personne, » {n}termine-t-il d'une voix plus douce.{/n}

languages.text: 「恋人同士に、公平な判断を求めることができるでしょうか？それに…」{n}ソロモーンの声が柔らかくなった。{/n}「自分が他人とそんなに親密な関係を築けるような人間だとは思っていないのです」
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

traits.locale_text: 「恋人同士に、公平な判断を求めることができるでしょうか？それに…」{n}ソロモーンの声が柔らかくなった。{/n}「自分が他人とそんなに親密な関係を築けるような人間だとは思っていないのです」

languages.text: «¿Se puede esperar que los enamorados se juzguen imparcialmente entre ellos? Además...» {n}El tono de Solomorne se suaviza.{/n} «No me considero una persona abierta a una relación tan íntima con otra persona».
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se puede esperar que los enamorados se juzguen imparcialmente entre ellos? Además...» {n}El tono de Solomorne se suaviza.{/n} «No me considero una persona abierta a una relación tan íntima con otra persona».

languages.text: “被爱情束缚的人，真的能对彼此做出公正的判断吗？不仅如此……”{n}索罗蒙的声音变得柔和下来。{/n}“我恐怕并不是那种愿意与他人建立如此亲密关系的人。”
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."

traits.locale_text: “被爱情束缚的人，真的能对彼此做出公正的判断吗？不仅如此……”{n}索罗蒙的声音变得柔和下来。{/n}“我恐怕并不是那种愿意与他人建立如此亲密关系的人。”

languages.text: "Sevgililerin birbirlerine karşı tarafsız olmaları zordur. Hem..." {n}Solomorne'un sesi yumuşuyor.{/n} "Kendimi herhangi biriyle böyle bir ilişkiye hazır hissetmiyorum açıkçası."
languages.original_text: "Can lovers be expected to stand in unbiased judgement of each other? Besides..." {n}Solomorne's voice turns soft.{/n} "I don't see myself as someone who is open to having such an intimate relationship with another person."
